channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [added] Scalestack Agent (scalestack-scalestack-agent)
item.description: Scalestack's AI agents act as invisible GTM analysts that understand your ICP, coordinate across systems, and evolve with your GTM

item.title: [added] Wasabi AiR (wasabi-air)
item.description:
AI-Powered Intelligent Media Storage -
Quickly and affordably find and access every moment in every media file you own.

item.title: [updated] FalconStor Habanero (falconstor-software-habanero-service) has changed the description of the plan named annual-subscription
item.description: *before*: Pricing is based on source data in terabytes. Subscription commitment is for a full year with automatic renewal with monthly billing. If the service is cancelled, the remaining months of the annual subscription term will be billed. Starting price is $2,500 per month, which includes up to 250 TB active tier. Check with your IBM account manager for using IBM Power11 Virtual Server (PowerVS) hybrid cloud credits with Habanero Data Protection-as-a-Service to support backup, copy, disaster recovery, and archive use cases. IBM Power11 server packages ordered with PVS1 feature code include Habanero components: PowerVS instance, object storage, data protection software and service. Cloud credit packages for Habanero are: Small package, 250 TB @ $2,500/month, Medium package: 300 TB @ $3,000/month, Large package: 600 TB @ $6,000/month, *after*: Pricing is based on source data in terabytes. Subscription commitment is for a full year with automatic renewal with monthly billing. If the service is cancelled, the remaining months of the annual subscription term will be billed. Starting price is $2,500 per month, which includes up to 250 TB active tier. There are no data retrieval fees from active tier. Archive unused or infrequently requested data to save cost on storage of long-term data. Restoring data from archive tier may take up to 12 hours. Check with your IBM account manager for using IBM Power11 Virtual Server (PowerVS) hybrid cloud credits with Habanero Data Protection-as-a-Service to support backup, copy, disaster recovery, and archive use cases. IBM Power11 server packages ordered with PVS1 feature code include Habanero components: PowerVS instance, object storage, data protection software and service. Cloud credit packages for Habanero are: Small package, 250 TB @ $2,500/month, Medium package: 300 TB @ $3,000/month, Large package: 600 TB @ $6,000/month

item.title: [updated] FalconStor Habanero (falconstor-software-habanero-service) has changed the description of the plan named month-to-month-subscription
item.description: *before*: Pricing is based on source data in terabytes Subscription commitment is month-to-month with automatic monthly renewal. If the service is cancelled, the remaining days of the applicable calendar month will be billed. Starting price is $3,570 per month, which includes up to 250 TB active tier. , *after*: Pricing is based on source data in terabytes Subscription commitment is month-to-month with automatic monthly renewal. If the service is cancelled, the remaining days of the applicable calendar month will be billed. Starting price is $3,570 per month, which includes up to 250 TB active tier. There are no data retrieval fees from active tier. Archive unused or infrequently requested data to save cost on storage of long-term data. Restoring data from archive tier may take up to 12 hours.
